CustomField.description: Your SMS Signature will be appended to the initial messages for each of the number until we hear/reply back from the sms recipient. For the signature you should have 'Company Name' and 'Opt Out' instructions in the signature.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Your SMS Signature will be appended to the initial messages for each of the number until we hear/reply back from the sms recipient. For the signature you should have 'Company Name' and 'Opt Out' instructions in the signature.
CustomField.label: SMS Signature
